general.gigTitle: do website development as full stack web developer, front end, backend developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Visionary Mobile App Developer and Website Solution Expert
sellerCard.description:
This is Mahmuda Islam, a senior software developer proficient in mobile app development and full-stack web development with 4+ years of hands-on experience.

Technologies that I expert: 

- Cross-platform (Android and iOS)
- Flutter/ Dart
- Javascript/ ReactJs/ NextJs / Nodejs / ExpressJs
- MongoDB/MySQL/Firebase

I create functional and user-centric digital experiences with a proven track record of delivering 350+ successful projects on Fiverr.

I'm excited to be part of your website or mobile app journey! Let's discuss your project and bring your vision to life today!

description.content:
Are you looking for an experienced full stack web developer to develop a functional, user-friendly custom website that propels your business forward?


Hold on! You're exactly where you need to be!


I'm Rumi, your go-to full-stack web developer, ready to transform your wildest ideas into stunning digital realities. I've spent the last 4 years mastering the art of full stack website development, specializing in creating and designing custom websites for individuals, small businesses & corporate clients.


Technologies that I use to build a custom site:


  1. Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Next JS, TypeScript, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI
  2. Backend: Node JS, Express JS, PHP Laravel
  3. Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL


Services I Offer:


  • Functional Custom Website Development
  • Attractive Layout with Color Combination
  • Fully Responsive Design
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • API Integration
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • SEO Friendly & Speed Optimization


Why I'm Different:


  • High-Quality Work & On-time Delivery
  • 100% Satisfaction
  • 24/7 Ongoing Support
  • Ô∏è30 Days of Free Support After Completion


Ready to start? Click the 'Contact Me' button for a quote or free consultation. Thank you.

slide.name: do website development as full stack web developer, front end, backend developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to build a custom website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll need details of your project requirements and your complete cooperation to achieve the best possible results.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for the Figma to Website conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Simply share your Figma design files and any specific requirements. I'll take care of the rest!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you assist with website maintenance after development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your website continues to perform at its best.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I request revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide a set number of revisions based on your package. You can request changes through the platform's messaging system.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help with branding and logo design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While my primary focus is on website development, I can collaborate with designers to help with branding and logo design.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the security of my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I implement best practices for website security, including SSL certificates, secure coding practices, and regular updates.

packageList.title: Home or Landing Page Design
packageList.description: Build or Rebuild Home/Landing Page/1 Page of Basic Responsive Site + Basic SEO (No API Integration)

packageList.title: 5 Pages Custom Website
packageList.description: 5 Pages of Responsive Custom Website + Ecommerce Functionality + Basic SEO + Ongoing Support

packageList.description: 10 Pages of Custom Website + API Integration + Ecommerce Functionality+ Basic SEO + Ongoing Support
